word: God's messengers must make their minds a treasure house of good things, from which they may be able to draw a "Thus saith the Lord" whenever occasion demands. They are to present things new and old. They must continually hold up the covenant of peace between God and man, that He made with His people Israel. Ms 64, 1903, pp. 1-7. ("God's Covenant with Israel," July 2, 1903.)
